comment.author: 28748636@N05
comment._content: For your info the man is using a hand pump to pump out water from the trench, these were sometimes manned 24/7 tough work

comment.author: 88025703@N00
comment._content: Amazing how comments can be so dismissive of the quality and the significance. Man, people drowned and bled to death here, or worse, survived in horrible conditions. It's a beautiful photo - of a war zone, not a summer camp.

comment.author: 41156770@N02
comment._content: in some cases men and horses drowned in mud, not water...think about how that one feels.

comment.author: 53623790@N04
comment._content: I went to see a play about officers who lived in one of these - it contained some black humour - I forget what it was called

comment.author: 59428880@N02
comment._content: La cara es....el demonio de la guerra

comment.author: 62787433@N08
comment._content: Impresionante muestra fotográfica vivo retrato de una de las facetas de la condición humana de esta cultura.
